ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kedge
ygData.msgSnippet: ... All mermaids in Kedge are druids. If you have anyone that can cast nullify or an enchanter to pillage I would go that route over using bard dispel song.
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Valharick@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Kedge
>Date: Tue, 7 Mar 2000 02:51:09 EST
>
>Well went to Kedge for the first time. All in all it was disappointing. The
>fact that I died 3 times and am currently separated from all my equipment
>(Estrella is sittin on it) doesn't help any. I wouldn't suggest anyone
>trying
>to find their way outa that place on your first visit. Its quite the maze.
>Anyways a few interesting things. I was told that they use ice based spells
>(well, true but they also use fire based and magic based suck as creeping
>crud). So be prepared with the apropriate songs. Also found our water
>breathe
>song stacks fine with enduring breath (but eb can't be cast on you if the
>song icon is still on). This was the first night I've used the cancel magic
>song much (thorns and the like on the mermaids) and I noticed there is no
>confirmation message (nothing like the spell message "feels slightly
>dispelled"). Be nice to get that lil thing remedied, I like to know if its
>beind resisted or what.
>Anyways on to the main reason for this post.
>This goes out to all yall MM'rs. Tomorrow we're gonna try a large scale CR
>but if it doesnt go well i'd like to have some insurance. What I'm looking
>for is a necro with the summon corpse spell. I'll give 100 plat to whoever
>finds the necro and 200 plat (plus 150 for the spell component) to the
>necro
>himself.
>
>Thanks yall.

All mermaids in Kedge are druids. If you have anyone that can cast nullify
or an enchanter to pillage I would go that route over using bard dispel
song. They will stinging swarm/creeping crud you, which is not a big deal.
The main thing is they tend to hit pretty hard in melee and can their nukes
hurt. They use ignite and combust alot seemingly with a 999 channelling
skill. They will also use avalanche (or pogonip, whatever the 40-ish
ice-based druid rain spell is called), which can really HURT. When fighting
any of the casting mobs in kedge, pixie strike them as soon as you see them
casting (especially when they try to G Heal themselveS). With my group, we
are stunning, slamming, and pixie striking our asses off on maids and they
don't last too long. Normally the puller is the only one taking much damage.
